scripts.bootstrap: node center/config_bin_init.js && node event/config_bin_init.js && node monitor/config_bin_init.js
scripts.center: node center/config_db_local.js && node center/config.js && pm2 flush && pm2 start center/config/webfunny_center.js
scripts.event: node event/config_db_local.js && node event/config.js && pm2 flush && pm2 start event/config/webfunny_event.js
scripts.monitor: node monitor/config_db_local.js && node monitor/config.js && pm2 flush && pm2 start monitor/config/webfunny_monitor.js
scripts.prd: npm run center && npm run event && npm run monitor && pm2 log
scripts.restart: npm run stop && npm run delete && npm run prd
scripts.event_prd: npm run center && npm run event && pm2 log
scripts.event_restart: npm run event_stop && npm run event_delete && npm run event_prd
scripts.monitor_prd: npm run center && npm run monitor && pm2 log
scripts.monitor_restart: npm run monitor_stop && npm run monitor_delete && npm run monitor_prd
scripts.event_slave: node event/config_db_local.js && node event/config.js && pm2 flush && pm2 start event/config/webfunny_event_slave.js && pm2 log
scripts.monitor_slave: node monitor/config_db_local.js && node monitor/config.js && pm2 flush && pm2 start monitor/config/webfunny_monitor_slave.js && pm2 log
